Antony Bartlett PhD
:::

:::{.text-info}

<p class="information">I am a PhD candidate at TU Delft in the Netherlands.</p>
<p class="information">Having spent a considerable time in industry, building test pipelines for numerous applications, I decided it was time for a new adventure.</p>
<p class="information">Leveraging my decade plus years of testing experience, along with my passion for new technology, I now specialise in applying traditional test techniques to Machine Learning pipelines.</p>
<p class="information">The overall goal of my research, is to take test pipelines from data validation, all the way through to deployment in Cyber-Physical systems.</p>
</p>
